title: Luxury 2-Lvl Haight Furnished Stunner
posting_body: ['Luxury 2-Lvl Furnished Stunner', '858 Ashbury, San Francisco, CA 94117', 'FEATURES', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2.5', 'Located on Floor #:', '1', 'Floors in Bldg:', '3', 'Square Footage:', '2250', 'Private Parking', '$300/mo', 'Property Type:', 'Condo', 'Pets Allowed:', 'Dogs', 'Agent Name:', 'Pamela Kelley', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Available:', 'Aug 1, 2022', "Oscar Wilde once said, 'It's an odd thing, but anyone who disappears is said to be seen in San Francisco.", "It must be a delightful city and possess all the attractions of the next world.'", 'A truly rare offering to reside in a breath-taking luxury FURNISHED ONLY home renovated to the most exacting standards with a raft of only the finest of design and master craftsmanship exuding privacy and exclusivity, this stunning home creates a benchmark for inner-city living of true international appeal.', 'Perfectly situated, this two-bedroom, two-in-a-half bath.', 'Two-level home (2250/sq ft) luxury home is centrally located along contoured streets surrounding the suburban-style neighborhood of Haight-Ashbury that offers a sense of seclusion and isolation that is reminiscent of a small-town feel with all the amenities of the city.', 'The home is of modern design, for integrated indoor-outdoor living.', 'Special features include a light-filled, fully equipped eat-in kitchen, Thermador appliances, formal dining room, high end European fixtures and radiant heated floors throughout.', 'Modern furniture is provided throughout the house including the finest décor that revolves around a collection of paintings and wall art created by the Owners father.', 'A spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows complimented by a fabulous 2-level outdoor space deeded to this unit only...perfect for entertaining.', 'PLEASE NOTE:', 'This furnished only home is available to individuals in transition.', 'RENTAL UNIT AMENITIES', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Washer/Dryer', 'Fireplace', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Patio', 'OTHER AMENITIES', 'High-Speed Internet', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Microwave', 'OTHER PRICING DETAILS', 'Available Date: Aug 1, 2022', 'Deposit: $6,500', 'Minimum Lease:\xa08/mo', 'Utilities:\xa0Tenant Pays', 'Parking:\xa0$300', 'CONTACT INFO', 'Pamela Kelley, Broker', 'show contact info', 'DRE# 01824381']
